goal.ch: 昆蟲為生物歧異度最高，種類最多的一個動物群， 許多種類的昆蟲與人類之間的交互作用非常密切。 透過講課、顯微鏡觀察、昆蟲採集、標本製作和蜜蜂農場參訪等活動，本課程將介紹昆蟲的各分類群， 內外部形態， 並就昆蟲與自然界和人類之間的關係，加以探討各類昆蟲的生活習性。
goal.en: The Insecta is known as the most diverse group of animals on earth. Many insects closely interact with human activities, and some are human commensal. In this course, students will learn the taxonomy, anatomical features, ecology, behavior, and life history of insects from the lectures, laboratory activities, specimen preparation, and honeybee farm visit.
